price: 16. Maalintaan qabaneyno qabashada  weyn5. Hubaal waanu aarsan.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
footnotes: 5. Qabashadii weyneyd waxay dhacday dagaalkii Badar markii la jabiyey gaaladii oo badi madaxdoodii lagu dilay dagaalkaasi, qaar kalena la soo qafaashay.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
